title: Wild Trading Session Sees Tellor’s TRB Token Slide From $720 to $180 in Hours
description: Futures tracking the lesser-known token saw $68 million evaporate in leveraged bets in a 24-hour period.

title: Crypto betting firm Stake secures naming rights to Sauber’s F1 Team
description:
Sauber has been rebranded as Stake F1 Team after the crypto betting and casino platform secured naming rights for 2024 and 2025.

Cryptocurrency betting and casino platform Stake will feature prominently in the next two years of Formula 1 after securing naming rights to Sauber’s F1 car.

The firm takes over from Alfa Romeo, which did not extend its sponsorship of Sauber’s C44 past 2023. The Sauber is set to be rebranded as Audi’s factory team in 2026 - leaving a two-year gap for other sponsors to step in on an interim basis.

Related: How OKX convinced F1 star Daniel Ricciardo it’s safe to promote crypto

Read more

title: Crypto losses near $100 million after orbit bridge exploit
